scripts.taskViewer:dev: concurrently -n "TaskViewer-BE,TaskViewer-FE" -c "magenta,green" "npm run start:dev -w taskViewerBe" "npm run dev -w taskViewerFe"
scripts.kill:port: node -e "const port = process.argv[1]; require('child_process').exec(`netstat -ano | findstr :${port}`, (err, stdout) => { if (stdout) { const pid = stdout.trim().split(/\s+/).pop(); require('child_process').exec(`taskkill /PID ${pid} /F`); console.log(`Killed process on port ${port}`); } else { console.log(`No process found on port ${port}`); } });"
scripts.kill:3000: FOR /F "tokens=5" %P IN ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :3000') DO @IF NOT "%P"=="0" taskkill /PID %P /F 2>nul || echo Port 3000 is free
scripts.kill:3001: FOR /F "tokens=5" %P IN ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :3001') DO @IF NOT "%P"=="0" taskkill /PID %P /F 2>nul || echo Port 3001 is free
scripts.kill:5173: FOR /F "tokens=5" %P IN ('netstat -ano ^| findstr :5173') DO @IF NOT "%P"=="0" taskkill /PID %P /F 2>nul || echo Port 5173 is free
scripts.kill:all: npm run kill:3000 && npm run kill:3001 && npm run kill:5173
scripts.kill:node: taskkill /F /IM node.exe 2>nul || echo No node processes running
scripts.pretaskViewer:dev: npm run kill:3001 && npm run kill:5173
